title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Whether you come for a few hours or are staying for a week, you need to know where to rest your head or satisfy your hunger at Valles Caldera.   Restaurants and Grocery Stores  There are no opportunities to purchase food or drinks within the preserve. Restaurants and grocery stores can be found in nearby cities.    Lodging Within the Preserve  Lodging is not available within the preserve.   Lodging Outside the Preserve  There are many lodging options in nearby cities.   Â    Camping At this time, Valles Caldera does not have any established campgrounds or backcountry camping permits available. Groups may explore the option of applying for a special use permit.   There are additional camping opportunities on the neighboring Bandelier National Monument and Santa Fe National Forest; several of which are less than 15 minutes from the preserve's main entrance.
